divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from school in my moms car looking out the window. When we were getting close to the bridge a glare hit my glasses but the sun was behined us. When i looked at were the glare was coming from i saw a silver disc shaped object reflecting the sun i thought it was a helecopter until i saw it was disc shaped. Then i thought what it could beand couldn't recognize any military aircraft like it.All it did until i lost sight of it was hover in a spining in a circle like a tornado.I lost sight of the object just vanished or speed off at incredible spped causse i was staring at it.
